scene_description_enriched: A bearded man, identified by a halo as a saint, stands in a forest setting, holding an open book with blue pages and gold stars. He is dressed in a blue robe with gold trim and a grey patterned tunic. He leans on a golden staff. To his right, a wild boar with a blue bell around its neck sits attentively. In the foreground to the left, a small fire burns. The background features a dense green foliage with golden leaves, suggesting a lush forest.
